attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAWS SURROUNDING COMMUTING BY BIKE IN LONDON.
attributes.additional_details: there have been a great number of cyclists killed in london because of careless motorists, clueless commuters and misdirection by cycle routes. as a cyclist myself i know the roads can be treacherous. man hold covers, pot holes and other hazards plague the roads. we aim to change the way cycle routes are laid out. we have made posters , met and spoken with many cycling enthusiast, taken poles and petititions and now we need the british publics help!
